title: Start of the Dinner Party
description: Michael tricks his staff into staying late to finish their work, only to reveal that he's planned a dinner party and they are all invited.

title: Guests Arrive
description: Jim, Pam, Andy, and Angela arrive at Michael's condo. Jan and Michael give them a tour of their home, highlighting the small plasma TV and Jan's workspace.

title: Awkward Conversations
description: The guests have awkward conversations in the living room. Michael shows off his tiny plasma TV.

title: Dinner Delayed
description: Jan reveals the osso buco needs to slow roast for three more hours, delaying dinner. The guests are stuck at the condo.

title: Serenity by Jan
description: Jan gives a sales pitch about her candle business, 'Serenity by Jan'.

title: Dundie Destruction
description: An argument between Jan and Michael results in one of Michael's Dundie Awards being thrown into the tiny plasma TV.

title: Police Arrive
description: The police arrive due to a noise complaint. After assessing the situation, they leave.

title: End of Party
description: The dinner party ends with most of the guests leaving as quickly as they can.
